todo-rest-server-client-mongo-twilio
====================================

a simple todo client server app using mongodb and twilio sms notification


Architecture

SERVER
		server built using Jersey



Client
		Angular js consuming the rest server


Documentaion
		Swagger ui


Notification System
		Twilio


Social Networking 
		FB like
		Twitter share

Analytics
		Google Analytics
		Server side
		Mixpanel
